forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 40. West wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn gently approaches over Boston, the sky wears a cloak of tranquility, mostly cloudy with the promise of clearer skies in the hours to come. The air carries a crisp edge, a hint of the chill that accompanies November nights, settling around 40 degrees. An understated west wind whispers through the city, keeping the warmth of your home longed for. 

The day ahead unfurls like a well-prepared novel, revealing chapters of mostly sunny skies, as the temperatures rise toward a comfortable 61 before gently receding later in the afternoon. With the northwest wind expected to produce playful gusts up to 21 mph, it may be wise to wear layers. A stylish cardigan over a soft flannel shirt or a light jacket will balance the cool air while allowing you to bask in the pockets of sunlight that will grace the city. This is a day to savor the simple joys; perhaps you might take a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, lose yourself in the vibrant hues of foliage that cling stubbornly to the trees, or meander through the neighborhoods, where the remnants of autumn converge with the rhythmic pulse of urban life.
